Name: Gonic
Overview:
DESCRIPTION
FLOSS alternative to subsonic, supporting its many clients.

NOTES
• The default credentials: admin/admin (user/pass).
• You have other variables that you can use to fully customize the service. Check 'https://github.com/sentriz/gonic#configuration-options' to know more.
• To configure 'jukebox' checl the GitHub repo: 'https://github.com/sentriz/gonic#with-docker'.

VERSION
1.0 (2022-02-09)

@attributes.Name: Storage (data)
@attributes.Description: This is the location of the internal data from Gonic.

@attributes.Name: Storage (cache)
@attributes.Description: This the location the temporal files, like: transcodes, covers, etc.

@attributes.Name: Storage (music)
@attributes.Description: This is your media library for your music.

@attributes.Name: Storage (podcasts)
@attributes.Description: This is your media library for your podcasts.
